remarks:
Define a one-to-one onto function.  For equivalent definitions see ~ dff1o2 , ~ dff1o3 , ~ dff1o4 , and ~ dff1o5 .  Compare Definition 6.15(6) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 27.  We use their notation ("1-1" above the arrow and "onto" below the arrow).  (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)
